description: Build failure due to missing dependency: libv8-3.14-devel package not found. This prevents generation of package file list during installation.
Autotools version mismatch: configure.ac requires Automake 1.16.2 but detected 1.16.5. Patching failures and aclocal warnings indicate need to regenerate build system with 'autoreconf'.
GHC compiler out of memory during build process. Additional error: RPM patch file (ghc8.6.4-sha-1.6.4.4-alt1.patch) is invalid (smaller than 8 bytes).
Test failure during %check phase: Meson test suite execution failed. Full test log available in meson-logs/testlog.txt.
Fatal GObject registration error: Cannot register existing type 'GIRepository' during test execution. Accessibility service activation succeeded but caused critical failure.
CMake configuration error: Invalid cmake_minimum_required syntax. Compatibility with CMake <3.5 was removed - requires update to modern CMake version syntax.
Type compatibility error in C code: Incompatible pointer types when casting GucharmapChartableCellAccessible to AtkObject. Build fails at gucharmap-chartable-accessible.c:131.
Dependency resolution failure: Missing libjsonrpccpp-devel package prevents build process from completing. Installation fails during package file list generation.
